overview: Live performance from US doom metal band Trouble, recorded in Stockholm in 2003. Among the songs featured are 'At the End of My Daze', 'Run to the Light' and 'Psychotic Reaction'.  R.I.P.  Come Touch the Sky  At the End of my Daze  Plastic Green Head  Fear  Memory's Garden  The Misery Shows (Act II)  Psalm 9  Run to the Light  All Is Forgiven  Psychotic Reaction  The Skull  Revelation (Life or Death)  The Tempter
title: Trouble: Live in Stockholm
